head.title: Home - Pleasant Community Digital Academy

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

ul.li: Students arriving for breakfast may enter at 8:15 AM
All other students may enter at 8:30 AM and report to homeroom.
Classes begin PROMPTLY at 8:45 AM. ALL DOORS will be LOCKED at this time.

div.div:
Vision - Building Blocks of Excellence for the Foundation of our Future!
Mission- By partnering with our students, families, and community, Pleasant Community Digital Academy will create a foundation, which encourages students to reach high expectations for social, emotional, and academic excellence.
Building Block Goals:
A - Academics focused around scientific, research based curriculum and data driven decisions for improved student learning.
B - Behaviors for positive character development; which promote a respectful, caring and safe environment for improved student learning.
C - Collaboration with students, families and community to promote a partnership that is focused on improved student learning.
